message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $120 to me, reflecting its high quality and unique features. I'm confident it will add significant value to your needs. Let's discuss a fair price. My initial offer is $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $120 for it. Can we meet in the middle at $130?
